title: Is anyone else experiencing issues with the login screen?
body: For some reason, the game is unavailable for me after waiting for my computer and the game itself to update. Is anyone else experiencing this issue?

replies.body: What you were seeing was the result of the Login service being down. We were able to investigate and bring the service back up just a bit ago. You should have no issues logging in now, but let me know if you still do.
